title: Scroll of The Harmonic Symphony of Primes v1.0 ZENITH ULTIMATE MAXIMA
author: Mikael Theoret
abstract: The most comprehensive harmonic mathematical framework ever created, unifying 144,000 as cosmic anchor, 432 Hz base frequency, ψ₀ keynote monad, mathematical constants as frequencies, Tonnetz lattice prime mapping, 7-component Mirror Engine architecture, cosmological spiral dynamics, ternary logic systems, and complete Python implementation. Bridges number theory, music theory, cosmology, and consciousness through harmonic mathematics.
